Articles.Content:
Hey all great to be here with such a great community! ;D

I just had one quick question: I DL\'d a few mods that required plug-ins and but them in my plugin folder but they don\'t seem to work. can you describe were to put them really fast. I also have the Demo so I don\'t know if that makes a difference

(my folder looks like this: KSP--->Parts

Plugins

Screenshots

ect...)

Thank\'s for all the help!

-Kronosx
Plugins dont work in the demo version, so youll have to get the full version to use plugins, rest of the mods for the demo simpily go in the parts folder if there parts and ships in the ships folder.
Awesome! Thank\'s a ton! ;D I\'ll be getting it right after finals for sure
